root.name: King's Quest II: Romancing the Throne
root.description: EnemiesHagatha the Hag - a mean old cannibalistic hag, she is also the main antagonist of the game. Dracula - The original vampire from Bram Stoker's book with the same name. The Big Bad Wolf - the classic wolf from The Brothers Grimm's: The Red Riding Hood. Easter Eggs On occasion you can see Batman's batmobile driving out of Hagatha the Hag's cave.The music played outside of Dracula's castle is actually a sample from Michael Jackson's "Thriller". Availability The game is available at gog.com or steam.PC System Requirements OS: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP Operating SystemProcessor: Pentium® III 800 MHz processor or equivalent Athlon™ processorMemory: 128 MB RAMGraphics: Microsoft® Windows® Compatible Video cardHard Drive: 815 MB of Hard Drive spaceSound: Microsoft® Windows® Compatible Sound card

similar_games.game: Space Quest III: The Pirates of Pestulon
